personal.name: Edison Xu
personal.title: Software Development Engineer & AI/ML Engineer
personal.bio:
Hey, I'm Edison ðŸ‘‹
I'm a Full-stack developer and AI engineer with a passion for integrating AI into everyday objects. By day, I build web applications; by night, I explore machine learning, AI systems, and intelligent technologies. Currently, I work full-time at Highmark Health as a Software Engineer, developing internal AI and ML solutions.

I love exploring how AI can enhance accessibility and help people with disabilities through wearable technology. I've also participated in numerous AI and coding hackathons and projects, constantly pushing the boundaries of what intelligent systems can do. My goal is to make technology smarter, more intuitive, and more human-centric.

current.degree: Master of Science in Computational Science & Engineering

previous.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Applied Economics

achievements: Multiple AI and coding hackathons participant

experience.description: Architected autonomous AI deep research agent, engineered enterprise knowledge workspace with Vertex AI Search, developed multi-modal chatbot using Vertex AI (Gemini API), built RAG system using Flask, deployed GitOps CI/CD pipelines with Cloud Run and Kubernetes.
Developed market cycle prediction model using machine learning algorithms, optimized PySpark and Azure Databricks data pipeline with data partitioning and caching.

projects.title: FigBrain: Figma Multi-Agent Plugin
projects.description: Built a Figma AI agent at the Microsoft AI Hackathon, enabling natural-language prompts to generate and populate FigJam components via the Model Context Protocol (MCP) and automated Figma API/plugin flows. Designed a supervisor multi-agent system using LangGraph, where a master orchestrator routed tasks to planner, executor, and verifier agents with Chain-of-Thought prompts and ReAct loops, validated at ~85% first-try accuracy. Cut API costs ~28% and lowered latency through long/short-term memory mechanism, plan/result caching, and dynamic model switching between lightweight and advanced LLMs.

projects.title: Golang-based High-Efficiency Search Engine
projects.description: Developed a Go-based search engine with text and vector search capabilities, using gRPC for microservices architecture. Implemented a distributed web crawler with Kafka cluster integration for efficient data collection and processing. Enhanced search relevance using TF-IDF and BM25 ranking algorithms, with Trie trees for optimized query suggestions.

projects.title: CloudBin: Cloud-Based Distributed File Storage System
projects.description: Designed a storage system using Spring Boot, Vue3 and AWS S3, featuring chunk-based file uploads for reliability. Leveraged Redis with a Bloom Filter to prevent cache penetration, boosting cache hit rate and reducing database load. Integrated ElasticSearch for efficient fuzzy file name searches, reducing search time and improving accuracy.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Revolutionary AI-powered portfolio system: edit a single JSON file to get a complete interactive portfolio with an intelligent chatbot. Built with Next.js, React, and TypeScript. Features modern design, dynamic project showcases, and zero code required for updates.

internship.currentStatus: Currently employed at Highmark Inc. as Software Engineer
internship.workStyle: Fast learner, team player, problem solver
internship.goals: Continue building AI-powered solutions and contribute to innovative projects while growing expertise in enterprise-level development.
